headline: Oppenheimer Backs ServiceNow (NOW) as AI-Fuelled Workflows Support Growth Outlook
summary: ServiceNow Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the best large-cap tech stocks to buy now. On July 24, Oppenheimer analyst Brian Schwartz reiterated his Buy rating on ServiceNow and lifted the price target to $1,150 from $1,100. He pointed to strong sales execution, solid margins, and contract revenue in the first half of the year that exceeded […]

headline: CRM Bets on ADAM Framework: Will it Fortify Leadership in Agentic AI?
summary: Salesforce's ADAM framework, which includes Agents, Data, Apps, and Metadata, aims to power safe, scalable AI agents and fuel the company's next growth phase.

headline: Project Portfolio Management Market Surges to $13.7 billion by 2029 - Dominated by Oracle (US), Smartsheet (US), Microsoft (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Project Portfolio Management Market is expected to grow from USD 7.8 billion by 2024 to USD 13.7 billion by 2029 at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 11.9% during the forecast period. headline: NewRocket Names Jason Rosenfeld as Chief Growth and Alliances Officer
summary: NewRocket, a leading digital workflow and AI advisor and Elite ServiceNow partner, announced today that it has named Jason Rosenfeld as the company's Chief Growth and Alliances Officer (CGAO), a newly created executive role designed to drive strategic growth both through deepening NewRocket's partnership connection across ServiceNow and by delivering great outcomes for key clients. Rosenfeld joins NewRocket after serving as the CEO at Cask NX, a pure-play ServiceNow Elite Partner focused on end-
